page.title: 06Education
page.content: There are about 200 children in the Primary School and 9 teachers the children go to school at 8.55 and go home at 3.15. An ordinary day for an infant might be maths,play with toys,english and then they might read a book.an ordinary day for a junior,9.00 Assembly,9.30 english,10.40 playtime and after that maths,12.00 Dinner and playtime 1.15 topic work,2.35 swimming or games and at 3.15 hometime The school uniform is grey trousers and a grey jumper and a grey or white shirt.For the girls grey skirt and a white blouse and a grey cardigan. The first part of the school was layed in 1845.
